name: Nana vs Meteor
description:
Introduction :

This is an action runner survival game, where you will control an adorable heroine who must dodge meteorites. 

It flies and can take a maximum of 3 meteorites. The fourth meteorite is fatal. Your goal is to avoid as many obstacles as possible to make the best score! It's up to you! 

how to play ?

(it is recommended to play the web version in full screen to avoid the visual bug linked to the browser & other)

Control :

  and   arrow to move 

The mouse to validate the menu

Escape to pause the game

Crédit :

Juhani Junkala : Music 

Dems : Design and Developer 

Thanks for playing.
